text: The Great Mandarin () is a 1949 West German comedy drama film directed by Karl-Heinz Stroux and starring Paul Wegener, Carsta Löck, and Käthe Haack. It was the final film of the veteran actor Wegener. ==Cast== == References == ==Bibliography== * == External links == * Category:1949 films Category:1949 comedy-drama films Category:German comedy-drama films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Karl-Heinz Stroux Category:Films set in China Category:Bavaria Film films Category:German black-and-white films Category:1949 comedy films Category:1949 drama films
title: The Great Mandarin
